PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-05692020-08-25,  ,  ,  ESDC,  , 
ActCanada Student Loans Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS in order to help (1) make post-secondary education more accessible and affordable for borrowers in financially challenging circumstances by introducing interest-free and payment-free medical and parental leave on Canadian Student Loans repayment; (2) address the financial burden and stress on students who take temporary leave from their studies for medical and parental reasons, including mental health leave; and (3) reduce financial barriers to completing their post-secondary education.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0184 Publication Date: 2020-09-16
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations
precis: Regulations amending the CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS in order to help (1) make post-secondary education more accessible and affordable for borrowers in financially challenging circumstances by introducing interest-free and payment-free medical and parental leave on Canadian Student Loans repayment; (2) address the financial burden and stress on students who take temporary leave from their studies for medical and parental reasons, including mental health leave; and (3) reduce financial barriers to completing their post-secondary education.
